p.k: The locals who came from afar
p.d: Certain villagers of foreign origin arrived in Switzerland fairly late in their lives. The Bavarian cook, Klaus Riedl, moved to the Grisons, Jorge Chaves from Portugal runs a garage in Ticino, Mir Ahmad Shir Ahmad, originally from Afghanistan, lives in Luthern, Renatus Njohole, former Tanzanian professional footballer, settled in Onnens. Directed by: Patrick LÃ©ger (Switzerland, 2018)
